## encodeFloatToRGBA() function

Encodes a float into a rgba8unorm

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function encodeFloatToRGBA(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, value: PBShaderExp | number): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |
|  value | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) \| number | The float value to be encode |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)

The encoded rgba8unorm
